attributes.action: make Stephen fry the patron saint of england
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Elect Stephen fry as our new Patron Saint, He is England, an all round true gent and spiffing chap!!!

but what about st george?
why have a patron saint of england who's not enlgish! infact he's not even soley an english patron saint.
Saint George is the patron saint of Aragon, Catalonia, England, Ethiopia, Georgia, Greece, Lithuania, Palestine, Portugal, and Russia, as well as the cities of Amersfoort, Beirut, Bteghrine, Cáceres, Spain, Ferrara, Freiburg, Genoa, Ljubljana, Gozo, Pomorie, Qormi, Lod, and Moscow. And why recognize st george a saint when he slew a dragon, as being depicted as the size of a komodo dragon

we need to raise a bank holiday celebration every year for SAINT FRY, PATRON SAINT OF ENGLAND

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
